TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithNonEquiJoinPredicate
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2), <($6, $4))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(a, d), <(b, h))], select=[d, g, h, a, b, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, g, h], where=[<(d, 2)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFullOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[=(b, e)], select=[b, c, e, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : +- Calc(select=[b, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) +- Calc(select=[e, g]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[a, c, d, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- Calc(select=[d, g]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, d)], select=[d, g, a, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, g], where=[<(d, 2)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithMultipleKeys
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($1, $4))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(a, d), =(b, e))], select=[a, b, c, d, e, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, e]]) +- Calc(select=[d, e, g]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=(b, e)], select=[b, c, e, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : +- Calc(select=[b, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) +- Calc(select=[e, g]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testRightOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[=(b, e)], select=[b, c, e, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : +- Calc(select=[b, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) +- Calc(select=[e, g]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[Table5, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])
